response.original_title: The Cure - Live at Bizarre Festival
response.overview: The Cure - 08-22-1998, Bizarre Festival, Cologne, Germany. November 2017 Wdr Re-Broadcast  Setlist:  1) Shake dog shake  2) Fascination street  3) A strange day  4) One hundred years  5) If only tonight we could sleep  6) Pictures of you  7) Just like heaven  8) Sinking  9) Lullaby  10) Wrong number  11) Never enough  12) In between days  13) From the edge of the deep green sea  14) Cut  15) Disintegration  16) Untitled  17) A forest  18) 10.15 saturday night  19) Killing an arab  Duration: 109 Minutes  Robert Smith - vocals, guitar  Simon Gallup - bass  Perry Bamonte - guitar  Jason Cooper - drums  Roger O' Donnell - keyboards
response.title: The Cure - Live at Bizarre Festival
